= Weechat =

== First steps ==
    # register nickname
    `/nickname foo`
    `/msg NickServ REGISTER password youremail@example.com`
    # identify your nickname
    `/msg NickServ IDENTIFY password`


== Tips ==
    # connect to a french distant tmux session `ssh -t remotehost LANG=fr_FR.UTF-8 tmux a -t sessionname`
